alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Dale, southern Henry, eastern Geneva and Houston Counties in southeastern Alabama, north central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida, southern Clay, western Calhoun and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 147 PM EDT/1247 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Abbeville to near Headland to near Hartford. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Cottonwood, Fort Gaines, Headland, Dothan, Blakely, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Edison, Webb, Columbia, Centerville, Malvern, Rehobeth and Grimes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
